## Install

``` sh
pip install chemchem
```

### Thermochemistry

``` python
Al = Compound('Al')
```

``` python
Al.get_amounts(grams=32.5)
```

    {'grams': 32.5, 'molecules': 7.251130383218443e+23, 'moles': 1.204506708175821}

``` python
#Al.properties
```

H2O = Compound('H2O')
